name: Panic Reaction
description:
GMTK 2020 gamejam:

Theme: Out of Control

Escape the Cult of DOOM. Only problem: You panic when you see enemies, darting away without control. You can sneak for moment, but beware, Banshee is coming to get you and without the adrenaline surge from panicking, you wont get away.

Use all your billiard and minigolf skills to escape the cult!

Arrow keys for movement, you run away from enemies at panicked state and lose control of character. Game has three levels.
